author: jerenkrantz
msg: Add chunking input test with mod_echo_chunk_post:
- 0-length chunk followed by a trailer (which is our pid).
(Expect 200 response with our input trailer as response entity.)
- AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA-length chunk followed by a trailer.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Add mod_echo_post_chunk which does the following:
- reads in chunked input via the 1.3 API (yuck)
- prints out the X-Chunk-Trailer header AFTER the chunked input is read.
This module is designed to check trailer enforcement.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Drag in the ap_compat.h header which drags in the apr and apr-util

msg: The recent changes require a full recompile.  Lack thereof has bitten
